availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Margaret J. Winders Stinnett (Todd County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, resident. Todd County native. Married to Noel N. Stinnett. Mother of Harriet Stinnett, William W. Stinnett, Nancy Stinnett, Cyrus Stinnett, Leander M. Stinnett, Jasper N. Stinnett, Mary Stinnett, Martha Stinnett, Fidella Stinnett, John Stinnett, and Robert Stinnett.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 1, p. 214. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 31. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Elkton, p. 62. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1912, Ballard County, Kentucky, file no. 9067.
